violations: Workers in unsafe positions - standing on debris
locations: Central area of the construction site
Area with scattered wooden planks and debris
Surrounding the stacked metal and wooden items
General walkways blocked by disorderly materials
recommendations: Ensure all workers wear hard hats and appropriate PPE at all times.
Clear paths and walkways of debris and materials to prevent trips or falls.
Secure all loose items and debris to prevent accidental falls or injuries.
Organize materials and maintain clear routes for emergency access.
worker_positions: One worker standing near the center among debris
Another worker closer to the tool storage area on the right

worker_identifiers.features: no hard hat, standing near central debris
no hard hat, green jacket, near tool area
